title: My opinions on Sylas
body: Nobody probably cares about my opinion but {{champion:517}} Sylas....is awesome!! I love his character and the lore behind him, finally showing the bad side of Demacia and that Demacia really stands by its anti-magic belief. His kit I love, its interesting and fun to play, plus he's hot so 10/10
